the activity of cutting the wool off a sheep: Sheep shearing is a traditional skill.

the process of cutting the hair on a person's head close to the skin: the punitive shearing of convicts
the process of cutting or breaking something so that part of it becomes separate: If the shearing of olfactory nerves is complete, there is little that doctors can do to help. See
